name: Space Drift Squad
description:
Lead your squad through the possibilities brought by the universe. Either by traveling across the stars or defending your planet, do risky maneuvers near asteroids to acquire protection for all players. Take benefits of power-ups to destroy any threat, who appears on the screen. Survive as a team, score as a team, protect yourself as a team.



Explore the outer space destroying asteroids and discovering hostile spaceships scattered across the milky way. For how long will be possible to resist against the constants attacks of those space residents?



A meteor rain is threatening the life on Earth and your squad was chosen to preserve it. Beware of imminent danger, an enemy ship wants to take this opportunity to destroy the Earth whenever possible. Besides that, a huge asteroid must be destroyed so it does not cause massive damage to our planet.



• Two game modes - Get the best score possible in Endless Mode and defend the Earth for as long as possible in Defense Mode.
• Drift – Do risky maneuvers to fill your shield bar.
• Couch Coop - Call your friends for a party and have fun across the galaxy. Supports up to 4 players.
• Leaderboards - Show your friends who have the best squad.
• Easy to learn - In no time you will play this game like a pro.
• Quick game - Great to play when the time is short or on the queue for another game.
• Full controller support - Possible to play using keyboards or controllers.
• Remap System - Configure your controls as you see fit.
